question: Can I invite my close friends and family and do a Khatame-Quraan or Yaseen or Ayat-e-Kareema to invoke Allah?s blessings and Rahmat?
answer:
QUESTION
Are there any conditions attached? Can this be done to provide Sawaab to the Ruh(Soul) of a deceased person?
ANSWER


Share:
You should avoid doing so. These friends will not be reciting for the pleasure of Allah Ta'ala, but just to please you. What benefit or thawaab can then be expected?

One may simply request them to do good actions and make the intention that the deceased also receives the reward. In this way, there will be sincerity in what little they do.

And Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Ml. Imraan Vawda
FATWA DEPT.
